fieldset.label_en: Find Readers rejected their TBR Task for a Document

combo-editable.assistance_dql: select distinct object_name from cd_quality_gmp_effective(all) where category=1

combo.assistance_dql: select distinct r_version_label as label from cd_quality_gmp_effective(all) where i_position = -1 and object_name like '%$value(doc_name)%' and a_status in ('Effective','Release Pending','Superseded','Withdrawn','Suspended') order by 1 enable(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: Note, You can select document versions with status in "Effective, Superseded, Release Pending, Suspended, Withdrawn".
